overview: Mr. LIN Yang, born in 1966, is the President, Executive Director of the Group and responsible for the overall business management of the Group. Mr. Lin graduated in 1988 with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computing Communications from the Xidian University and in 2005 with a Master degree in Business Administration from Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business. He joined the Legend group in 1990 and has over 17 years of management experience in distribution business. Mr. Lin was appointed as the President of the Company in April 2008.

firm.name: Digital China Information Technology Services Company
